pullRequest.title: Add doc about defaults Spring Boot naming strategies
pullRequest.bodyText:
…out how to configure the Quarkus properties to use them
Could you, please, take a look @geoand ?

nodes.bodyText: Hm... Did we update the Spring Boot version? If so, why? If not, why did we bump the Spring Boot version here?

We need a Final version here, not an Alpha. This will be backported to 1.3.1.Final.
If 2.2.Final is not an option, use 2.2.SP1 or something like that.
/cc @geoand for verification.

Suggested change
